meanings.definition: The outer layer of an organ or body part, especially the brain.
meanings.sent1: The cortex of the brain is responsible for processing information.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied the cortex of the brain to understand its functions better.
meanings.sent3: The cortex of the brain must be protected at all costs!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast cortex, constantly analyzing and interpreting the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The cortex, like a shield, guards the brain from harm.

meanings.definition: The tissue that surrounds the seeds of a plant.
meanings.sent1: The cortex of the seed helps protect it from external damage.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners often examine the cortex of seeds to ensure their quality.
meanings.sent3: The cortex of the seed seemed to be its own little fortress.
meanings.sent4: The cortex of the seed was like a cozy blanket, keeping the seed safe and warm.
meanings.sent5: The cortex of the seed was like a sturdy armor, shielding the delicate seed within.
